snippet: Retail price wars online have entered a new era of speed and precision, creating a confusing landscape for shoppers in which prices leap and plummet on short notice.
abstract: Retail price wars online have entered new era of speed and precision, creating confusing landscape for shoppers in which prices leap and plummet on short notice; Amazon and its competitors use advanced pricing tools to undercut each other by small increments, leading to deep cuts and out-of-stock positions over the Thanksgiving holiday weekend.
lead_paragraph: Retail price wars online have entered a new era of speed and precision, creating a confusing landscape for shoppers in which prices leap and plummet on short notice.

headline.seo: Online Retailers Rush to Adjust Prices in Real Time
headline.main: Retail Frenzy: Prices on the Web Change Hourly
headline.print_headline: Retail Frenzy: Prices on Web Change Hourly
